The photos shared in the Facebook post s: 2. A reverse image search on Google traced one of the photos back to an article from 2010 about a protest held by animal-rights organization People for Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA) in the US.
Another reverse image search on Google t: 4. One of the images in the Facebook post is a montage that was deemed potentially "violent or graphic" on Facebook and greyed out. A reverse image search of the image led to a 2012 multimedia report about an event to promote the launch of the video game "Resident Evil 6", which included meat in the shape of human body parts.
